# NumberFormatter.Style

**Enumeration**

The predefined number format styles used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/numberStyle] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Overview

The table below provides examples of each formatting style for the U.S., France, and China.



## Formatting Styles

- **NumberFormatter.Style.none**: An integer representation.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.decimal**: A decimal style format.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.percent**: A percent style format.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.scientific**: A scientific style format.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.spellOut**: A style format in which numbers are spelled out in the language defined by the number formatter locale.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.ordinal**: An ordinal style format.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.currency**: A currency style format that uses the currency symbol defined by the number formatter locale.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.currencyAccounting**: An accounting currency style format that uses the currency symbol defined by the number formatter locale.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.currencyISOCode**: A currency style format that uses the ISO 4217 currency code defined by the number formatter locale.
- **NumberFormatter.Style.currencyPlural**: A currency style format that uses the pluralized denomination defined by the number formatter locale.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Behavior**: These constants specify the behavior of a number formatter. These constants are returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/defaultFormatterBehavior()] class method and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/formatterBehavior] property.
- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition**: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be padded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/paddingPosition] property.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode**: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be rounded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/roundingMode-swift.property] property.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
